title: AG60071: Post Harvest Engineering Operations - Quick Facts
text:
AG60071
Course name | Post Harvest Engineering Operations
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Hydrothermal treatment conditioning of grains, Modern paddy and wheat parboiling-systems, equipment, Advances in heat transfer and fluid flow in grain processing operations. Humidification and dehumidification operations applied to post harvest engineering. Crop drying principles, moisture migration theories, advances in crop drying theories mathematical modeling, Crop drying methods systems and Crop dryers selection, design and testing.
